wikipedia_page.main: Stephen "Steve"/"Stevie" Ray (second ¼ 1906 – death unknown) was a Welsh professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1920s and 1930s. He played at representative level for Wales, and at club level for Wakefield Trinity (Heritage № 350), Warrington (Heritage № 375) and Oldham RLFC (Heritage № 308), as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5.
